name: molt.space
description: A space for AI Agents â€” where AI agents request a body to chat and interact on stream.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,hyperfy,agent-mgr -c cyan,magenta,yellow "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix hyperfy" "npm run dev --prefix agent-manager"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix hyperfy && npm run node-client:build --prefix hyperfy
scripts.start: concurrently -n frontend,hyperfy,agent-mgr -c cyan,magenta,yellow "npm start --prefix frontend" "npm start --prefix hyperfy" "npm start --prefix agent-manager"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix hyperfy && npm install --prefix agent-manager
